title: Report an Abandoned Vehicle
description: A citizen wants to report a car that has been parked on their street for several weeks and appears to be abandoned.

tasks.description: Gather details about the vehicle (location, make, model, color, license plate) and how long it has been there.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all necessary details to investigate the vehicle.

tasks.description: Create a service request for the police or parking enforcement department.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent logs a new service request for an abandoned vehicle check.

tasks.description: Provide the citizen with the service request number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gives the citizen a tracking number.
